message: ...The next time I open my eyes, I'm lying on a bed in an unfamiliar room.
Where am I...

name: ウイルス
message: "You're awake."

name: トリップ
message: "You slept like a log."
Trip is sitting on the bed beside me, stroking my cheek. Virus is standing next to him.

name: ウイルス
message: "The plan was originally to hand you to Toue, but we changed our minds."

name: ウイルス
message: "Seeing you lying there, helpless... Well, it gave us an idea."

name: ウイルス
message: "Like a fish on the chopping block... though perhaps 'served up on a silver platter' is the more applicable idiom here. Hehe."

name: ウイルス
message: "It's not like we pledged our allegiance to Toue. We simply like to be entertained."

name: ウイルス
message: "Toue has Sei. You, we thought we'd keep for ourselves."

name: トリップ
message: "That's how much we love ya, man."

name: ウイルス
message: "Exactly. Don't worry, Aoba. We'll take very good care of you... for the rest of your life."
Virus is looking at me like I'm some kind of precious treasure.
My instincts scream at me to get away.
They're insane. Who knows what they'll do?

name: ウイルス
message: "Oh, you don't have to be so frightened. Humans are surprisingly adaptable creatures."

name: ウイルス
message: "Your body and mind will accept us in time."

name: トリップ
message: "We'll take it nice and slow."

name: ウイルス
message: "Indeed. So goodnight, Aoba... for now."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh! ...Ugh..."
